title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Overview / Vision Of The Project:The mission statement of Meme Alliance is to connect Meme communities in one ecosystem.As our flagship game, Meme Alliance will be a high-quality, on-chain, first-person shooter (FPS) developed in Unreal Engine 5.Communities like PEPE, SHIB, BONE, ELMO, VOLT, and many more will be thrown onto the battlefield in an epic battle for victory and reward.Let's unite the power of memecoins into one inclusive ecosystem; Meme Alliance!Marketing Plans:Multiple high profile Twitter influencers calls and interactions.Multiple AMA on renowned and established Telegram lounges and channels.Multiple Youtube influencers to create a project preview and presale announcement.PR Articles and Billboards.Regular Discord events and activity.Recent Accomplishments (If Applicable):-Meme Alliance has a total of 3,400+ members on the Telegram group chat.-Twitter: Meme Alliance has a total of 2,500+ Followers with around 85 low quality or inactive followers-Offline beta completed for Meme Alliance FPS-NFT staking for Meme Alliance tokensSize Of Team / Team Details:-4 Core Team Members-Full stack developer-GFX Artist-Marketing/Development x 2Additional Support :-Social media content creators-Unreal Engine Dev's-Telegram & Discord ModsAdditional Support :-Social media content creators-Unreal Engine Dev's-Telegram & Discord ModsUtilities Of Token (If Applicable):-First Person Shooter Game- Play to Earn & Win to EarnAn on-chain first person shooter developed in Unreal Engine 5 where players can play as one of the many meme token mascots against other users.Several game modes and maps accessible for both token holders and non-holders.Players can earn tokens when they level up in game, another option is playing competitively and being on top of the leaderboard.A Marketplace will be available for players to change the costume, skins, weapons, and more. Using the Meme Allliance token in the marketplace offer discounts to encourage users to the token as the primary option in making any purchase.-Meme Alliance LotteryHolders can stake their MMA tokens and choose what tokens they want to receive from any of the whitelisted Meme tokens that has a staking pool.This will be a flexible staking where users can unstake their MMA token in 24 hours.3 Reasons Why Viewers Should Purchase Your Token:We are committed to success through hardwork, honesty and transparency.A high-quality game made accessible to everyone removes the difference between meme communities and unites them in an amazing environment.Unique Combination of Meme's and GameFI.ALL SOCIALS ; Website: https://www.meme-alliance.com/Telegram: https://t.me/RealElmoERCTwitter: https://x.com/memealliancefpsOther: https://discord.gg/ZuUy9d5XRn

comments.author: Ms_Mining
comments.body: The launch of messages from spam bots purchased by the theme author is declared open.
